Title: Establishes the natural carbon sequestration research program
Summary: Establishes the natural carbon sequestration research program to develop innovative science-based solutions to facilitate sequestration of carbon in New York's natural and working lands.
LawCode: Add ยง151-j, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the natural carbon sequestration research program
